items.content_html: üö• The best job scheduler for Node.js and JavaScript with cron, dates, ms, later, and human-friendly support. Works in Node v12.11.0+, uses worker threads to spawn sandboxed processes, and supports async/await, retries, throttling, concurrency, and cancelable promises (graceful shutdown). Simple, fast, and lightweight. Made for @forwardemail and @ladjs.
items.title: breejs/bree: :traffic_light: The best job scheduler for Node.js and JavaScript with cron, dates, ms, later, and human-friendly support.  Works in Node v12.11.0+, uses worker threads to spawn sandboxed processes, and supports async/await, retries, throttling, concurrency, and cancelable promises (graceful shutdown).  Simple, fast, and lightweight.  Made for @ForwardEmail and @ladjs.

items.content_html: RabbitMQ is an open-source and lightweight message broker which supports multiple messaging protocols. It can be deployed in distributed and federated configurations to meet high-scale, high-availability requirements. In addition, it's the most widely deployed message broker, used worldwide at small startups and large enterprises.
items.title: hebertcisco/nestjs-microservices-rabbitmq: RabbitMQ is an open-source and lightweight message broker which supports multiple messaging protocols. It can be deployed in distributed and federated configurations to meet high-scale, high-availability requirements. In addition, it's the most widely deployed message broker, used worldwide at small startups and large enterprises.
